website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba Satellite Radius 11 (L15W-B1302) is a convertible-hybrid laptop that doubles as a tablet and offers a basic Windows 8 system at an affordable price.
pros: Convertible design folds for Laptop, Tablet, Tabletop, Presentation, and Audience modes

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is small and light
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is small and light, though I probably won't use the tablet or presentaton mode. It is moderately fast,, and easily carried. At first the touchpad interfered with my typing,,as I was unable to keep my thumb from brushing against it.and causing the courser to move. But I was able to uninstall the touchpad.. I use a mouse anyway, and now it reaads that the touchpad is inactive because it has detected another device,,,my mouse. I would recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: LuckyRuffles

customer_reviews.title: I called support and they were anything but helpful and recommended I take it to 3rd party repair shop because ...
customer_reviews.text: Started off alright, but after using for awhile, it rarely impressed. Jerky screen when scrolling through sites, the keyboard keys are cheap and typing on them makes it tough to not hit multiple keys. Just after 1 year of owning the computer it shut down and stopped working. I called support and they were anything but helpful and recommended I take it to 3rd party repair shop because its out of warranty and not their problem anymore. I would not buy this computer again. Has some cool features like converting laptop to tablet but you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Inspite of that I've been inpressed and well satisfied, would recommend it without hesatiation
customer_reviews.text: Been inpressed! bought it as a gift, was not my first choice. Had listed about15 on my wish list, ones that met my specs. then let my daughter select what she wanted. Was not the one I had in mind, was the one she wanted. Inspite of that I've been inpressed and well satisfied, would recommend it without hesatiation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P.

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1 computer
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Tablet and laptop all in one. Great for light computer work, web surfing, chatting etc. Mine arrived with windows 10 and office installed. Love being able to flip it to table mode for reading. Keyboard has good firm feel and mousepad has buttons for right & left click instead of the common flat mouse pad on too many laptops today. Toshiba rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED FOR TRAVEL AND MORE LAPTOP-LIKE THAN ...
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED FOR TRAVEL AND MORE LAPTOP-LIKE THAN A TABLET. HAVE USED TOSHIBA LAPTOPS FOR OVER 20 YEARS - VERY DURABLE AND HARDY. ONLY PROBLEM IS WEAK SOUND, BUT THAT'S A KNOW TOSHIBA PROBLEM - ALL MINE HAVE HAD THIS CON. HOWEVER, EVERYTHING ELSE OUTWEIGHED THIS BY A LOT.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: This computer turned out to be a lot better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This computer turned out to be a lot better than I expected. I wanted an inexpensive very portable computer to carry along in my brief case while I'm with clients and this unit is it. It's very light and compact but has the storage capacity and speed of bigger computers more than double the cost. It also has Toshiba quality at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Solimar 256 CC

customer_reviews.title: Runs well and looks great, perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: Compact, fast (much faster than Lenovo Yoga with same specs). Looks great. Go for the SSD option 128GB if you can, same price. Perfect for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Plays video games pretty well on lowest settings (league of legends for comparison ...
customer_reviews.text: After using an application to get rid of the bloatware toshiba provided, this laptop is up and running perfectly. I suggest using pcdecrapifier and adwcleaner to get rid of everything you dont need. Plays video games pretty well on lowest settings (league of legends for comparison runs at max fps on lowest settings). It does everything i need to do, and it does it well.
customer_reviews.author: abraham watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly! Little computer with a lot of features! I can't complain much, only one small issue was the speakers sounded staticky at first. Currently using it for school and home use.
customer_reviews.author: enriquefree

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Saw a few negative comments, but I have had no issue with speed or touchscreen. Slightly heavier than anticipated, but overall perfect and keyboard is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Orangotango-in-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time
customer_reviews.text: one year later... the hard-drive failed and I had to buy a new computer, the touch screen and mouse pad are also unreliable and the computer continually gave me the blue screen... I bought a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Laiken Wilkening

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop; I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop and user friendly. Everything is perfect but it could be better if the battery were not inbuilt. The It also has enough hard drive capacity for all your documents, movies,etc. I love the anti-scratch exterior as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Tetteh

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen, cool.
customer_reviews.text: It's compact and manageable for small areas, great!! Good battery life, added plus it is touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Isidro Flores

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it...have told a lot of friends and customer about this and have sent them the link
customer_reviews.author: jeanette leblanc

customer_reviews.title: I desided to save some money and bought this one ...
customer_reviews.text: I desided to save some money and bought this one. It was a mistake. After first day - problem with touch pad - it stopped working, after one week the sound stopped working. I bought it to watch cartoons for my kid but I can't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Kryzhanouski

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the first few months. My sister got the same thing, and hers was so fragile it broke after a few months too. The sound quality for both computers wasn't great either. We would have been better off with cheaper, more durable models.
customer_reviews.author: Tosin Sanusi

customer_reviews.title: Touchpad becomes unresponsive at times.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, in size and capacity but touchpad becomes unresponsive at times, especially when switching from tablet to laptop mode or using Microsoft Word.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this laptop a week ago and I love it. The sleek design and the tablet mode ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this laptop a week ago and I love it. The sleek design and the tablet mode are the best thing from this laptop.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This laptop it's the worst operating system I didn't recognize any boody to buy this product

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible laptop. It freezes, half the time the curser doesn't work. All in all an awful buy. I wouldn't recommend anyone purchasing this product.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the size and functions work great!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has been everything my wife wanted. It and the one my granddaughter have do freeze up unexpectedly at random times. Otherwise the size and functions work great!

customer_reviews.title: Great Value price
customer_reviews.text: Great Value price. Had to format it cause it comes with a ton of useless apps. After that is really nice

customer_reviews.title: ... to it and it seems to be a little better than my 15

customer_reviews.text: Great for the first 3 months, ran smooth however after the 3 months the mouse pad does not work and I am a tech savvy person but am not able to figure out what is wrong. Very frustrating.

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: This came to me in a very reasonable time frame but when we opened it and turned it on the keyboard wouldn't work. We tried everything we could think of to get to work. It is now sitting at a computer repair shop waiting to be diagnosed

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a great computer that can turn into a tablet and not ...
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a great computer that can turn into a tablet and not cost and arm and a leg. Welp this item is it!

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my senior needed is big enough and fouch screen. . So many ways to use it. Great battery life. Perfect

customer_reviews.title: Tricky at first !!!
customer_reviews.text: This computer took awhile took to get used too. When I first turned it on I freaked out because it looked like an apple system. Once you get used to it it's like driving a car,
customer_reviews.author: mark gray

customer_reviews.title: intact and beautiful. However it was more silvery than gold but ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was on time, intact and beautiful. However it was more silvery than gold but neat. the only problem I face is his little annoying dot in my screen and it has no plans of moving.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: ... had a Chromebook for a couple of years and loved it. My main computer though was a Toshiba ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Chromebook for a couple of years and loved it. My main computer though was a Toshiba laptop I'd had for years. When I decided to update my main laptop I wanted something similar to the Chromebook but with a good operating system and some memory. It's very difficult to find a laptop with any kind of hard drive like this. This one has one and it's awesome. It's small, fast and has a touch screen! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DebLee

customer_reviews.title: like a case or something
customer_reviews.text: This Toshiba does exactly what I need it to do. I am not playing games, etc on it so it works for me. I do have a few issues with it, though. The keyboard isn't covered when you convert it to a tablet, leaving the keys open to being pushed on and stuff. I have tried to find some sort of workaround, like a case or something, but haven't found anything yet. The screen is bright and nice LED. Touch is responsive, mouse works just fine for a small laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jessicah Painter

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Although it is a bit slow and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Although it is a bit slow and gets really hot when in use. Despite this it fits my needs well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Already had one from a board that I am on. Works great for the price so I bought one for my wife and daughter

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Toshiba Believer
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new laptop...the touch screen is great and the ability to make things larger for viewing ease is awesome. The rotating screen, allowing it to work like a tablet makes it easy for different applications The fast processor allows me to move quickly through different windows, making my work easier. This is my 3rd Toshiba laptop and I like them for their dependability. This one is the best for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Small & convenient. Keyboard is a little awkward, ...
customer_reviews.text: Small & convenient. Keyboard is a little awkward, but works well enough. Gets about 4-5 hours on a battery charge.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible excuse for a laptop. Almost immediately after initial setup, it started freezing up and went into a mode that I didn't even recognize.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This computer is awesome, I havent found anything wrong with it. I mostly use it for art and college and it works like a dream
customer_reviews.author: C.sythe

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After just two short months yhe screen does not ever come on. A waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Not good color. Already had problems
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Very small. Not good color. Already had problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The screen, weight, and feel are all great with the lap top, but the actual things that matter are horrible. Tons of bloatware pre installed on the computer, and even after you delete all of the garbage they have on it the computer still runs at the slowest speed imagineable. Will be returning. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: darian johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The display failed in couple weeks. Half the display is white...
customer_reviews.author: Sathian P.

customer_reviews.title: $335 Dollar Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Kept freezing and crashing while online within the first few weeks. Past 30 day return policy Toshiba Support was no help. Spent 2 hours on the phone with them. They told me it must have a virus or malware. Final resolution was " Simple fix for $252 by Toshiba " That is a direct quote from the guy I spoke to at Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: Customer25

customer_reviews.title: Great price for what it is...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop works just fine. The touch-screen is a little bit to get used to if you have never had a touch-screen laptop before. My only issue is that the cord suddenly stopped charging the laptop after 6 months of use. I had to call Toshiba Customer Support and get a replacement. My customer service issues are another story altogether... Bottom line, it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C.

customer_reviews.title: Not 11.6 inches
customer_reviews.text: By the time I got this package from my sister I was one day past the return date sadly. It's a 11 inch laptop not 11.6. That matters because the screen is much smaller. Just super disappointed I wasted money on this. 11.6 is as small as I'm willing to go but this is not even a true fit to that size.This computer just sits on a shelf now I don't even like using it. Might as well just look at my phone screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good to buy from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this model, and found it is good and can function up to the moment. Lucky I bought from Amazon.com it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better and the price was just right
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered ahead of time. Sharp image and very fast. Could not ask for better and the price was just right.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This computer had so many problems. I could not do a thing on it.

customer_reviews.title: The replacement works fine. Size and flexibility are great
customer_reviews.text: First one received DOA with a battery that would not charge. The replacement works fine. Size and flexibility are great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: awesome laptop!!! 👍
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer. Works great for browsing the internet, doing work on for online classes, watching videos, playing games,and everything else. I love how it can be laptop, tablet, or sits great for watching Netflix hullu or sling on. Great picture and light weight. My only complaint would be the volume on it when watching shows. Its not very loud. But I would definitely recommended this laptop for the everyday computer user.

customer_reviews.title: Advertised wrong
customer_reviews.text: Operating system was advertised as 8.1 64 bit ,it came as windows 10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter! She used it for school work.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful computer and I loved for the first few weeks. But I realized it gets slower with time even after my bf cleans out the viruses regularly. And I keep having this problem were my mouse pad doesn't work at all and keeps selecting random items. I really wish I would have bought something else. This was a waste of 350 dollars.

customer_reviews.title: Let the buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars, I would. Device would NOT switch back and forth from laptop to tablet mode and was EXTREMELY slow. Returned to sender.

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would perform as expected. Not satisfied with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible computer. Very slow
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Terrible computer. Very slow, touch screen doesn't work half the time. I haven't used PC's in a long while (been on Mac since 2014). I didn't realize how horrible Windows 8.1 is...that plus the terrible software has me packing this overpriced paperweight up and sending it back for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. But has a few glitches like when Im in tablet mode the touchscreen keyboard disappears so I have to change to Laptop mode to type, really inconvenient. Other wise Nice and great for college
customer_reviews.author: SIMSTA

product_meta.title: Toshiba Radius 2-in-1 11.6" Touch-screen Laptop - Intel Celeron Processor N2840 / 4GB Memory / 500GB HD/ Webcam / Windows 8.1 64-bit -Satin Gold
product_meta.description: The Satellite Radius 11 is designed to be flexible to your needs. You can easily switch from enjoying Windows 10 your way on the laptop, to flicking through web pages on the tablet — and all on one adjustable device. Simply fold the Satellite to move seamlessly between either mode, using the "gear type" dual hinge. This innovative dual hinge allows you to flip the HD screen around from zero to 360 degrees. Flip it back to make the most of the intuitive touchscreen or open it out flat to give friends a clear view of your media. Your convertible revolves around you.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
